tool.name: Analyze Data
tool.description: for gene set enrichment using Confero DB, MSigDB, GeneSigDB collections
tool.command: ../bin/cfo_run_cmd.pl analyze_data --input-file=$ranked_list --orig-filename="$ranked_list.name" #if $id_type.value != "?" --id-type="$id_type" #if $id_type.value == "GeneSymbol" and $organism.value != "?" --organism="$organism" #end if #end if --report-file=$analysis_results --data-type="$data_type" --report-output-dir=$analysis_results.extra_files_path --analysis-algorithm="$analysis_alg_cond.analysis_alg" #if $analysis_alg_cond.analysis_alg == "GseaPreranked" --scoring-scheme="$analysis_alg_cond.scoring_scheme" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.gene_set_dbs.value is not None --gene-set-dbs="$analysis_alg_cond.gene_set_dbs" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.filter_bool_expr.value != "" --filter-bool-express="$analysis_alg_cond.filter_bool_expr" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.filter_annotations.value is not None --filter-annotations="$analysis_alg_cond.filter_annotations" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.filter_organisms.value is not None --filter-organisms="$analysis_alg_cond.filter_organisms" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.filter_contrast_names.value is not None --filter-contrast-names="$analysis_alg_cond.filter_contrast_names" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.filter_gene_set_types.value != "" --filter-gene-set-types="$analysis_alg_cond.filter_gene_set_types" #end if #if $analysis_alg_cond.do_ar_analysis.value == True --do-ar-analysis #end if

param.name: ranked_list
param.label: Input Ranked List to Analyze
param.help: The input file should be a ranked list in the following format: a two-column tab-delimited file where the first column are your IDs and the second column are your ranks (which are typically the statistic metric t-test (S) or log2 fold change (M)). You do not need a column header.

param.name: id_type
param.label: Query IDs From
param.help: Select ID type if not already set in file header

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism
param.help: Select organism if not already set in file header AND your IDs are gene symbols

param.name: do_ar_analysis
param.label: Perform AR-only Gene Set Analysis
param.help: applies only to MSigDB C2 CGP and Confero DB

param.name: gene_set_dbs
param.label: Analyze Using the Following Gene Set DBs

param.name: filter_bool_expr
param.label: Filter Gene Sets by Free Text Expression
param.help: Can use ANDs and ORs to create boolean logic expressions (e.g. NFKB and TNF)

param.name: filter_annotations
param.label: Filter Confero Gene Sets by Annotations

param.name: filter_organisms
param.label: Filter Confero Gene Sets by Organisms

param.name: filter_contrast_names
param.label: Filter Confero Gene Sets by Contrast Names

param.name: filter_gene_set_types
param.label: Filter Confero Gene Sets by Gene Set Types

tool.help: This tool will analyze data for gene set enrichment using the Confero gene set DB, MSigDB, and GeneSigDB collections.
